name: Cypress Mount
shortDescription: Cypress is an end-to-end testing framework gaining traction which later added support for component testing, meaning that you can unit-test components directly in Cypress. This library adds Angular support to Cypress component testing.
longDescription: Cypress is an end-to-end testing framework gaining traction which later added support for component testing, meaning that you can unit-test components directly in Cypress. This library adds Angular support to Cypress component testing.
